description.lang: The flush-mounted CONNECT radio receiver with switch will be referred to below as flush-mounted receiver. The flush-mounted receiver can be used to switch loads on and off via radio (for information about permitted loads, see the technical data). When it receives the radio signal, the flush-mounted receiver switches the corresponding contact.CONNECT radio receiver, flush-mounted, 1-gang switchSwitching of ohmic, inductive or capacitive loads. To install in flush-mounted sockets or on a ceiling hook in the ceiling rose.
